com.ibm.mce.sdk.plugin.inbox

Class RichContentDatabaseHelper

  • java.lang.Object
    • SQLiteOpenHelper
      • com.ibm.mce.sdk.plugin.inbox.RichContentDatabaseHelper

  • public class RichContentDatabaseHelper
extends SQLiteOpenHelper
    This class is the inbox messages dao.
